name: King's Quest 4: The Perils of Rosella (AGI Version)
name_original: King's Quest 4: The Perils of Rosella (AGI Version)
description:
King's Quest 4: The Perils of Rosella (AGI Version) is an adventure game developed by Sierra On-Line.
You can play King's Quest 4: The Perils of Rosella (AGI Version) on PC.
